name: Subterrarium
description: Subterrarium is a puzzle game about digging, gardening, and vending machines.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and up Processor: 2. Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP and up Memory: 4 GB RAM

reviews.review_text: kinda short, and needs more challenge puzzles, but the mechanic is enjoyable and the game is oddly addictive.
